statements: UPDATE inventory_management SET quantity = 10 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE inventory_management SET location = 'Warehouse A', quantity = 20, last_updated = '2022-01-15 09:00:00' WHERE product_name = 'Product X';
UPDATE inventory_management SET quantity = quantity + 5, last_updated = NOW() WHERE id = 101
UPDATE inventory_management SET supplier = 'New Supplier', quantity = 25, location = 'Warehouse A' WHERE id = 202
UPDATE inventory_data SET quantity = 100 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE logistics_data SET location = 'New Warehouse' WHERE product_id = 5;
UPDATE inventory_data SET quantity = quantity + 10 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE logistics_data SET in_transit = TRUE, estimated_delivery_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE location = 'Warehouse A';
UPDATE inventory SET quantity = quantity - 1 WHERE id = 101;
UPDATE orders SET customer_name = 'John Doe', order_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE order_id = 201;
UPDATE inventory SET quantity = quantity - 3, product_name = 'Updated Product' WHERE id = 123;
UPDATE orders SET customer_name = 'New Customer', quantity = quantity + 2 WHERE order_id = 456;
UPDATE Inventory SET quantity = quantity + 5 WHERE product_name = 'Apple';
UPDATE Suppliers SET supplier_name = 'New Supplier' WHERE supplier_id = 2;
UPDATE Inventory SET quantity = 20, price = 15.99 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Suppliers SET supplier_name = 'New Supplier Name' WHERE supplier_id = 3;
UPDATE inventory_items SET quantity = 20, cost = 15.99 WHERE item_id = 101
UPDATE suppliers SET location = 'New Location', location = '987-654-3210' WHERE supplier_id = 201
UPDATE inventory_items SET quantity = quantity - 5, cost = cost * 1.1 WHERE item_id = 101
UPDATE shipments SET quantity = quantity + 10, received_date = '2022-07-15' WHERE shipment_id = 201
